Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.name: value
Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.abstract: Returns the current value that was set.

Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.name: getValueHandler
Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.abstract: Handler for getting the current value set.

Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.name: bindHandler
Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.abstract: Handler for when the value is set.

Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.name: bindAndFireHandler
Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.abstract: Handler for when the value is set and fires immediately.

Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.name: bind(_:)
Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.abstract: Binds the listener for listening for changes to the value.

Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.name: bindAndFire(_:)
Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html#/s:10Sw.abstract: Binds the listener for listening for changes to the value. It immediately gets fired.

Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html.name: SwiftyBindInterface
Structs/SwiftyBindInterface.html.abstract: A struct representing public attributes and methods for accessing instances of SwiftyBind.

Classes/SwiftyBind.html#/s:10SwiftyBindA.name: bind(_:)
Classes/SwiftyBind.html#/s:10SwiftyBindA.abstract: Binds the listener for listening for changes to the value.

Classes/SwiftyBind.html#/s:10SwiftyBindA.name: bindAndFire(_:)
Classes/SwiftyBind.html#/s:10SwiftyBindA.abstract: Binds the listener for listening for changes to the value. It immediately gets fired.

Classes/SwiftyBind.html.name: SwiftyBind
Classes/SwiftyBind.html.abstract: Generic class for binding values and listening for value changes.
